llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Strengthen the causal chain from AI/tfp uplift to y*, g* and asset valuations via a credible policy easing path, anchoring g* uplift with Range-projected 1–1.5% annual productivity gains (UPV3X2MQ6); What to watch: set explicit thresholds for disinflation credibility and a numeric g* path to trigger Regime A; Probability 65% (NL5YYTLF2)(OGK8WLL69)(UPV3X2MQ6).

Down | 3–6 months | Add explicit downside path: tariff/regulatory shocks or inflation surprises raise discount rates and cap crypto/treasury demand (OGK8WLL69)(NL5YYTLF2)(T1QE6JPIX); What to watch: inflation persistence crossing Jackson Hole thresholds and shifts in Regime weights; Probability 40%. 
Down | 0–3 weeks | Private-market liquidity squeeze and higher risk premia weigh on crypto/real assets (MW3AO9NFK); What to watch: BlackRock's Asia-Pacific private-credit pause as a lead indicator signaling widening dispersion; Probability 40%.
